Light travels faster than sound, which is the reason that some people appear bright before you hear them speak.

That's a humorous take on the old adage! It plays on the physical fact that light indeed travels faster than sound to make a witty observation about how people can make a good first impression visually, but then reveal less impressive qualities when they start talking. It's always fun to see how scientific facts can be turned into clever jokes. If you enjoy these kinds of witty remarks or have any other topics you'd like to explore, feel free to share!
